entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Ice pellets ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Showers beginning near midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 2 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 this evening. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High 9. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023
